org.springframework.web.reactive.accept

Class AbstractMappingContentTypeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.reactive.accept.AbstractMappingContentTypeResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingContentTypeResolver, RequestedContentTypeResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterContentTypeResolver, PathExtensionContentTypeResolver

    public abstract class AbstractMappingContentTypeResolver
extends Object
implements MappingContentTypeResolver
    Abstract base class for MappingContentTypeResolver implementations. Maintains the actual mappings and pre-implements the overall algorithm with sub-classes left to provide a way to extract the lookup key (e.g. file extension, query parameter, etc) for a given exchange.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

      Create an instance with the given map of file extensions and media types.

        Sub-classes can use this method to look up a MediaType by key.

        key - the key converted to lower case
        Returns:
        a MediaType or null

        protected List<MediaType> getAllMediaTypes()

      • resolveMediaTypes

        public List<MediaType> resolveMediaTypes(ServerWebExchange exchange)
                                  throws NotAcceptableStatusException
        Description copied from interface: RequestedContentTypeResolver
        Resolve the given request to a list of requested media types. The returned list is ordered by specificity first and by quality parameter second.
        Specified by:
        resolveMediaTypes in interface RequestedContentTypeResolver
        Parameters:
        exchange - the current exchange
        Returns:
        the requested media types or an empty list
        Throws:
        NotAcceptableStatusException - if the requested media types is invalid

      • resolveMediaTypes

        public List<MediaType> resolveMediaTypes(String key)
                                  throws NotAcceptableStatusException
        An overloaded resolve method with a pre-resolved lookup key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for looking up media types
        Returns:
        a list of resolved media types or an empty list
        Throws:
        NotAcceptableStatusException

      • extractKey

        protected abstract String extractKey(ServerWebExchange exchange)
        Extract the key to use to look up a media type from the given exchange, e.g. file extension, query parameter, etc.
        Returns:
        the key or null

      • handleMatch

        protected void handleMatch(String key,
                           MediaType mediaType)
        Override to provide handling when a key is successfully resolved via getMediaType(String).

      • handleNoMatch

        protected MediaType handleNoMatch(String key)
                           throws NotAcceptableStatusException
        Override to provide handling when a key is not resolved via. getMediaType(String). If a MediaType is returned from this method it will be added to the mappings.
        Throws:
        NotAcceptableStatusException

      • getKeysFor

        public Set<String> getKeysFor(MediaType mediaType)
        Description copied from interface: MappingContentTypeResolver
        Resolve the given media type to a list of path extensions.
        Specified by:
        getKeysFor in interface MappingContentTypeResolver
        Parameters:
        mediaType - the media type to resolve
        Returns:
        a list of extensions or an empty list, never null

      • getKeys

        public Set<String> getKeys()
        Description copied from interface: MappingContentTypeResolver
        Return all registered keys (e.g. "json", "xml").
        Specified by:
        getKeys in interface MappingContentTypeResolver
        Returns:
